MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 29-OCT-2020 12:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer, affecting Barscarrow Croft and surrounding properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8.09am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an overhead line fault in the Barscarrow area and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 12.00pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10:09am on 29th October 2020.
